圣诞新民俗：白胡子老头抢银行撒钱祝大家圣诞快乐 #别的简报# 【#白胡子老头抢银行撒钱祝大家圣诞快乐#】
据 BBC 报道，12 月 23 日，即圣诞节前两天，一位白须男子单枪匹马抢劫了一家银行，然后把抢到的钱撒了一地，同时还大声祝所有人圣诞快乐。
警方说，“一个年长的白人男性” 星期一午餐时间抢劫了科罗拉多斯普林斯的学院银行（Academy Bank in Colorado Springs ）。他成功把抢来的纸币装满了一麻袋，但他并没有拿回家自己逍遥，而是到处撒钱。目击者狄恩·帕斯卡尔（Dion Pascale）告诉科罗拉多州 11 News：“他抢了银行出来，把钱到处扔，还跟我们说圣诞快乐”。
目击者称，这名犯罪嫌疑人可能是忘了骑鹿出来，闲庭信步地走到附近一家星巴克，在前面坐着，等待警察的到来。与此同时，周遭场面十分热闹，众人疯狂捡起散落一地的美金，兜里都塞不下了，银行里充满了快活的空气。在享受捡钱的快乐后，大家乖乖把钱还给了银行。
撒钱的大白胡子白人老头，白拿钱的礼物庆典，众人还钱的爱心活动 —— 还有比这更圣诞的事儿吗？
http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw690/80f53663ly1gaa259wpy7j20ic0abh0i.jpg
https://www.weibo.com/2163553891/Imy4nsTcL
Colorado bank robbery suspect throws money into the air, yelling, 'Merry Christmas'
A Colorado Springs bank robbery suspect was feeling the Christmas spirit Monday afternoon.
David Oliver, 65, was arrested after robbing the Academy Bank, claiming he had a weapon and leaving with an undisclosed amount of cash, according to the Colorado Springs Police Department,
Witnesses said that before he was arrested, Oliver walked outside and began throwing the stolen money into the air, yelling, “Merry Christmas,” KKTV reported.
Bystander Dion Pascale told the television station that people scooped up the money and gave it back to the bank teller.
Colorado Springs police spokesperson Sgt. Jim Jeffocat told The Denver Post that thousands of dollars are still missing.
Oliver was found sitting in front of a nearby coffee shop shortly after the incident and was taken into custody, according to CSPD.
Police didn't find any indication that he had a weapon.
